stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: I have mixed opinions about this professor. She genuinely wants her students to succeed; she tried her best to make the material as accessible as possible with powerpoint and charts, and divided the grade into different assignments and tests so as to spread the risk. However, she is not a good teacher per se; I taught myself the material provided.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Had a lot of information to present to us and did a great job. PowerPoints were helpful, but not distracting. She clearly presented/reviewed the information to make sure we understood. Her tests/exams are NOT "just like the practice ones", so be prepared for that. As long as you review and UNDERSTAND the material, you\'ll do OK.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Prof. Cameron is a very clear lecturer and has a pleasent and inviting style to her. It\'s been said that a person only truly understands something when they can explain it simply, and Angela Cameron has this covered well. That said, she covers a whole lot of information in a lecture, so be sure to do the readings if you want to keep up!

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Prof. Cameron has the clearest lectures with the best powerpoints! She\'s very nice and cares a lot about students. A very reasonable grader. Prof. Cameron also spent a lot of time addressing the social issues with Property Law in a way that made it interesting.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I met Prof. Cameron once and she is extremely personable and kind. Particularly supportive and encouraging to LGBT+ identifying students. In tune with students\' mental health needs and challenges. Thank you!

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She\'s definitely a prof who looks to see the best in all her students, so she helps you out if you answer a question wrong in class. Also in sync with the mental/emotional needs of students (ie: gives less reading during busy academic periods).

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I would recommend! She provides powerpoint slides which are extremely helpful! The amount of readings she assigns are very fair and doable. She\'s nice and let\'s you know which class she will ask you a question for the participation grade, that way you can be prepared.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I loved Professor Cameron. No matter where you stand on the political spectrum or what your learning style is, you\'ll like her course. She varies the material and projects so that you have theoption to take an exam or paper depending on what your strengths and interests are. Brilliant, down to earth, funny... she\'s the gold standard for professors.

comments: One of the best profs I\'ve had among all my post secondary degrees (undergrad, masters, and JD). Gives you everything you need to do well. No tricks.

comments: She is a very hard marker. Be careful! She has this tough marking scheme that she follows for all her exams and will not give you any marks otherwise. She is not clear on her expectations either. Pick another prof if u can

comments: Prof. Cameron is an awesome professor. She is very clear with her expectations, she has great slides that uploads BEFORE class, she is engaging and truly interested in the success of her students. She is also very approachable so go see her in her office hours! I\'m def taking another course with her! She is also a very fair marker! :)

comments: GREAT professor! Lectures are very clear, uploads power points and past exams to the course website, schedules extra office hours the day before midterms and tries her best to be fair and give extra credits where possible. lectures are very detailed so you can get away without reading if your in a crunch.Learned a lot & did very well in this class

comments: She\'s nice and approachable, however, she\'s very disorganized - Property grades for the fall term came out mid-March and even then there was a recall because there were some calculation errors.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Prof Cameron is a great choice for first year property. Using a mixture of evaluation methods, students with different strengths will have the opportunity to do well. She genuinely cares about her students and provides an interesting perspective on an otherwise uninteresting topic - property. I would recommend her.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Most first year friendly Professor by far! Professor Cameron really helps first year students adjust and her teaching style is very easy to understand. Exams and midterms are fair with no surprises. I would recommend her to any first year student! You won\'t regret it.

tag_professor: Respected (7)  Caring (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Organized, knowledgeable and approachable. Really tries to help with first year exams which are a big ego blow to most people. In comparison to other profs - abs. fantastic. Also obviously committed to social justice issues. To those who didn\'t like this prof - I bet your mark sucked!
